fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article on university courses struggling to attract and retain students described orthoptics as “the provision of devices such as splints, braces and helmets, which help people recover from injury”. That description is of orthotics; orthoptics focuses on treatments for eye conditions (Next staff shortages will include radiographers, university council warns, 10 December, page 37). • Other recently corrected articles include: Rufus and Martha Wainwright review – quirky, magnificent festive blowout ‘The government is strangling cinema’: Brazil film industry fights for survival Christmas pudding: Yotam Ottolenghi’s recipe for chocoflan
